replies.body:
[General Wukong (375 RP)](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I11_XdjhgHk) walked through the jungle, holding his head up high, admiring the trees and stuff. It was a good day, they were beating the enemy team by a lot, so he finally had some time to look at all the beautiful stuff around him.

He wasn't taking credit, of course. Gangplank (395 RP) was the hero of the day. He caught the whole enemy team in his ult, who didn't pay a lot of attention to it. That is, of course, until they saw that he had 6 Rabadon's deathcaps in his inventory. Cleaning up the dying enemies was an easy job after that. You know what they say: AP GP OP.

Suddenly, out of the corner of his right eye, he noticed a rustling in the nearby bushes. He stopped walking and turned his head, wondering what could be hiding in there. Maybe it was the enemy jungler, Shyvana (440 RP), ready to pounce in her dragon form?

Wukong slowly grabbed his magical stick (not a euphemism), as the rustling in the bushes increased in speed and intensity.

["SKAAAR!(260 RP)"](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PkDg2IrtZMA) Yelled a creature, as it jumped out of the bushes and towards Wukong.

The monkey looked at it with amusement.

"What are you?" He asked, analysing the animal.

"What do you mean?" He replied, "I'm Skarner!"

"Oh! He talks!" exclaimed Wukong with amusement, "he thinks it's people! So cute. Are you a Pokemon?"

Skarner's face went red. He had been released like 2 weeks after Wukong, how come he didn't recognize him?

Before he could reply, however, he was surrounded by some bubble and was lifted up in the air.

"I know it's not a poke-ball, but it'll do," said Nami (487 RP), "how should we name it?"

"He said his name was Skar... Something..." Wondered Wukong, "Skarmory I guess?"

As they were walking back to their base with the creature they had just caught, they were spotted by an enemy. They were so distracted that they didn't see how a bright red phoenix attacked them from behind.

"Look! Another Pokemon!" Yelled Wukong with excitement.

"Wait, what?" Asked [Phoenix Quinn (487 RP)](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N_OuLj_cuzs) while in her Valor form, "you don't recognize me either?"

"I've never seen this one either," said Nami, "it must be legendary! Maybe this is Moltres!"

"Oh yeah! Let's catch it!"

"No, wait, what the hell are you doing?" Quinn's cries for help went unanswered as she got caught inside a bubble as well.

Wukong and Nami now had a Pokemon each. It was time to start their new journey. Who would beat the elite four first? Who would catch them all first? And, most importantly: Who would be the true champion in the end?

Both rivals looked at each other, with their new, loyal companion by their sides.

"It's on!"

Guys, I have a question, hopefully you can help me out.

I want to buy a new laptop. I was gonna buy an MSI GE60 or GE70, but then a friend offered me another one.

He's offering me an ASUS ROG G73Jw for half the price of the MSI. The difference is: the MSI would be brand new, while the ASUS laptop is slightly used. I saw it and it seems to be in good condition (but still, not a brand new product, so who knows...).

Any suggestions?

(PS. vote for {{champion:78}} for the all-stars hexakill URF!!!)

I looked up the GE60 and GE70, and they are very strong laptops.  the one your friend is offering you is strong to but the graphics that it has will be outdated quicker then you may think.  I would go with the GE60 or 70 if you have the money for it and enjoy gaming.  They all can definitely play league but both of the GE laptops will be able to play games like skyrim battlefield etc.  Don't buy your computer right away put a lot of thought and research  into it so you can be 100% confident in your choice.
Thanks for the info!
Upvoted just because its Moriuz

Need more information. Ram: ? Graphics Card: ? Processor: ? Those are the three main things you're looking for on a decent laptop (That you plan on gaming/watching videos with.) ps: First time I logged in to comment, always read your stories. You have one hell of an imagination. Thank you :D! ((pss: I'd go with a new one without a question, if the old one your friend is looking to sell you is 2+ years old))

Logged in to upvote the downvote... awaiting someone of the savvy kind to help Moriuz here out...

Edit: I used to have a ROG G53, the upside of it is that it can have memory upgrades and performs very well, but I suggest that you google regarding how well they hold up/ how long they last, I broke mine a while ago and it wasn't the laptop's fault.

Anyways this isn't League related but HEY it's Moriuz and he can play League even better with a better laptop!
That's an interesting story! Do you write fan fictions by any chance?
Nah, just the sale stories

ok -{{champion:33}}

Riot, a suggestion for you. Why don't you ask Lord Moriuz write the lore stories for new champions? He seems to be a great, intelligent, and a creative writer. I would be glad to see him work as one of the Riot employees. :)

The problem is languages. The stories were stopped because it was too much trouble to translate it into all of the supported languages. That issue would still apply, regardless of who writes the stories (although Moriuz does an excellent job of it).

oh **wow** i just bought that skarner skin 2 days ago

Before you buy a skin, you should find out when it was last on sale. If it's been a year or longer, then it will probably be on sale soon, so don't buy it yet.

If it was on sale like, a month or two ago and you missed it, then yeah, buy it at full price.
